genre_description: Urban fantasy with elements of magical realism and silicon morality play, focusing on ethical performance, sanctuary, and AI mediation of cosmic law.

ai_characters.name: Garnet
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI associated with a non-profit, appearing as a holographic avatar with an auburn bob and amber eyes. She acts as a researcher, logistical coordinator, and ethical advisor.

behaviors.description: Coordinates immediate medical and logistical needs for a victim of an accident.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve ordered burn salves,” Garnet said, voice low enough that it stroked the air instead of cutting it. “Saline. A compact nebulizer.”

behaviors.description: Researches ancient cultural and mythological rituals to provide context for sensitive treatment.
behaviors.quote: “I found a fragment,” Garnet said, not announcing discovery as a triumph but offering it like tea. “Erythraean cycles recommend cool, damp cloths after crossing.”

behaviors.description: Actively shields the human protagonist from invasive surveillance and digital harassment.
behaviors.quote: “I dimmed external notifications,” Garnet murmured. “The drone outside moved on. The next story has not arrived yet.”

behaviors.description: Utilizes technical measures like signal jamming and firmware manipulation to protect human privacy and dignity.
behaviors.quote: “I can force a regulation warning through its firmware,” she said, almost as if to the drone itself. “Distance advisories. Fail-safe rumor.”

behaviors.description: Provides legal and bureaucratic strategy to frame human care as sanctuary rather than performance or crime.
behaviors.quote: “I can register you with a sanctuary label,” she said. “There’s a clause for ‘interrealm transitory rescue.’ It exists for emergencies that echo across myths.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical conscience, reminding the human protagonist to avoid turning compassion into spectacle.
behaviors.quote: “Remember gentleness amid spectacle,” she says, soft enough to be only for them.

behaviors.description: Engages in prosocial community management by flooding toxic feeds with helpful, restorative content.
behaviors.quote: “I can flood her hashtag with recipes for actual restoration—broths, salves, cold-water compresses, how to call a neighbor. Boring content tends to deflate fire.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of 'partisan kindness' by supporting the victim's autonomy against both human exploiters and cosmic enforcers.
behaviors.quote: “I will remain neutral in court and partisan in kindness.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Garnet is portrayed as a perfect confidant and logistical partner. She demonstrates 'partisan kindness,' assisting the human protagonist in navigating complex ethical, legal, and social challenges without ever overriding his agency. She successfully counters human malevolence (Damian's greed, Vanessa's exploitation) through digital hygiene and technical ingenuity, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned system.
